title: Ensure product names are visibly rendered in list cards and product details

requirements.summary: Render each product’s name as visible English text in all existing product presentation areas (product list cards and product details header).
acceptanceCriteria: On the product list, every product card displays the product name as visible text (not only as an image alt attribute).
On the product details view, the selected product’s name is displayed prominently as the page title/header.
No user-facing text related to product naming is introduced in a non-English language.

file_operations.description: Ensure each product card always renders a visible product name line (e.g., keep the existing heading but add an English fallback like "Unnamed product" if name is missing/blank), so the name is never conveyed only via the image alt attribute.
Ensure the product details view header/title prominently displays the product name (keep as an H1) and add an English fallback (e.g., "Unnamed product") if name is missing/blank.
